reporting-org.narrative: Organisation des Nations unies pour l'éducation, la science et la culture (UNESCO)
United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization (UNESCO)

title.narrative: Strengthening the implementation of the 1954 Hague Convention and its two Protocols in East Asia

description.narrative: This activity aims to assist the awareness-raising and capacity building programmes for the effective implementation of the Hague Convention and its two protocols. Training sessions will be organized in collaboration with China Police Peacekeeping Training Center, to share in-depth knowledge on Protection of Cultural Property in armed conflicts for peacekeeping police officers, formed police units of anti-riot squads and military forces. National awareness-raising meetings are planned in Mongolia, to advocate the ratification of international treaties devoted to the protection of cultural property in armed conflict (in particular the Second Protocol) and prevent it from being destructed, pillaged, looted, or illicitly trafficked.
